hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Talon's House#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #6# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Green Potion Bottle#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Eyedrops#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Eyedrops#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: This hint is in another castle.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Guard House#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #the Bolero of Fire#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the symphony room# in the Spirit Temple protects...^ #the Broken Sword# and #Cojiro#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Symphony Room

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
